explanation: [0-0] On a city street at night, a woman with long blonde hair, wearing a white top, stands by the roadside. She is covering her mouth with her left hand and holding a pen in her right hand, looking ahead. Behind her, on the opposite side of the street, a white car is parked, and on the right side of the frame is the rear of another white car.
[0-2] The blonde woman then turns left and walks along the road, stopping at the rear bumper of a white pickup truck.
